nodes.text: The Bisellia system was a star system located in the Clacis sector, within the Outer Rim Territories and New Territories regions of the galaxy. The system was connected by the Entralla Route hyperlane to the Muunilinst and Endoraan systems.

The Bisellia system fell within the borders of the Pentastar Alignment between the years 4 ABY and 12 ABY, and was a part of the Imperial Remnant between 18 ABY and 35 ABY. The system was the origin point of the Lobster Bisellian meal.
The Bisellia system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square K-4.
